metadata.name: sj-db-tools
metadata.description: Database portability and migration tools. Supabase ↔ AWS RDS with zero lock-in.
metadata.author: SJ

plugins.name: supabase-to-aws
plugins.description: Full-lifecycle Supabase ↔ AWS portability plugin. Audit codebase coupling, enforce portability rules during dev, and automate migration (Auth → Storage → Database).
